comparison.description: How to compare the stored result of the specified command to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How to compare the stored result of the specified command to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the stored result of the specified command to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the stored result of the specified command to.

type.description: [Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/command) Compares the result of the specified command to the specified value. Type ID: `origins:command` !!! caution This entity condition type only operates on the server-side, meaning that it cannot be used in fields that are evaluated on the client-side.

Type ID: `origins:command` !!! caution This entity condition type only operates on the server-side, meaning that it cannot be used in fields that are evaluated on the client-side.
